contents.text: Thank you for calling Mesosphere in San Francisco, where we automate hybrid cloud infrastructures to power AI-driven IoT and data applications.
For information about our hybrid cloud automation solutions and pricing, press 1.
To schedule a live demo of our AI-driven infrastructure platform, press 1.
Please hold for a product specialist as we connect your call.

navigationGoals: Schedule a live demo of Mesosphere’s AI-driven infrastructure platform.
I’d like to book a live demo of your AI-driven hybrid cloud platform for my veteran-led IoT project.
Schedule a hands-on demo of their AI-driven hybrid-cloud automation platform.
I’d like to schedule a live demo of your AI-driven infrastructure platform to see how it works.
Schedule a demonstration of the AI-driven cloud platform and get fee details for a lab research project

contents.text: For pricing, licensing, and partnership inquiries, press 2.
Please hold to speak with a sales representative.

navigationGoals: Obtain detailed pricing, licensing, and partnership information from sales.
I need details on licensing fees and partnership deals for a veteran-owned hybrid cloud startup.
Get detailed pricing, enterprise licensing terms, and partnership options for their hybrid-cloud solutions.
I want to ask about pricing, licensing options, and possible partnership plans for your hybrid cloud services.
Inquire about academic licensing terms and partnership opportunities for integrating the platform into my coursework

contents.text: For technical support and developer assistance, press 2.
For technical support with your existing hybrid cloud environment, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a technical support engineer.

navigationGoals: Resolve a connectivity issue in our existing hybrid cloud environment with technical support.
I’m troubleshooting my existing hybrid cloud setup and need to speak with a technical engineer.
Connect with a technical support engineer to troubleshoot my live hybrid-cloud environment.
I need technical support to troubleshoot issues with my existing hybrid cloud environment.
Troubleshoot connection errors in my current hybrid cloud setup used for physics simulations

contents.text: For developer resources and IoT integration support, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our developer support team.

navigationGoals: Access developer resources and IoT integration support for Mesosphere’s platform.
I want developer guidance on integrating battlefield-grade sensors into your IoT cloud services.
Access developer resources and IoT integration support using their SDK and APIs.
I’m looking for developer assistance to integrate IoT sensors into my hybrid cloud setup.
Obtain developer guides and IoT integration support to connect experimental sensors to the cloud infrastructure
